model

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObserver<IBallCmd>

    public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
implements IObserver<IBallCmd>
    Ball class to generate balls with different strategies
